pkgmetadata.longdescription: Handling Hierarchically Structured Risk Factors using Random Effects Models // Using this package, you can fit a random effects model using either the hierarchical credibility model, a combination of the hierarchical credibility model with a generalized linear model or a Tweedie generalized linear mixed model. See Campo, B.D.C. and Antonio, K. (2022) arXiv:2206.15244.
